titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-306, by Mr. Gingrey.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 123.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 563.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 211 - 204 (Roll no. 606).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/18/2005--Passed House amended. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration or disposition of: (1) a bill or joint resolution making general appropriations for FY2006, any amendment thereto, or any conference report thereon; (2) a conference report to accompany H.R. 3199 (USA PATRIOT and Terrorism Prevention Reauthorization Act of 2005); (3) a bill or joint resolution relating to flood insurance; (4) a bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY2006; or (5) a resolution relating to U.S. forces in Iraq.
